comment: Adds a whitelist of packages that have known memory leaks

Sets the ASAN message to go to /va/log/asan${pid} by
default

Makes llvm not generate .cgprofile entries when we
do not use integrated-as
Used as destination of target generators
Fixes crbug/591436. Force fallback to traditional executable detection

Temporary workaround. Breakpad cannot handle Dwarf
Version 4. Works around issue by forcing Debug Frames
version of Dwarf to be version 1, while leaving the rest of
the Dwarf data at version 4

Fixes clang.elf calling clang.elf because direct
calls to clang.elf misses all environment setup in clang
wrapper. Calls to clang wrapper instead of clang.elf binary

Uses argv[0] to get host system information. Created
a wrapper of LLD and real lld becomes lld.elf so the LLD
cannot get the host system information and dies

Achieves the functionality of reordering .text.hot
sections before .text section
Fix type-dependency of bitfields in templates
[ARM] Fix infinite loop when lowering STRICT_FP_EXTEND
[DAGCombine] Fix alias analysis for unaligned accesses
[cmake] By default do not build compiler-rt with PGO
[cmake] Strip quotes in compiler-rt/lib/crt; error if checks fail
[Sema] Fix pointer-to-int-cast diagnostic for _Bool
[Sema] Add -Wpointer-to-enum-cast and -Wvoid-pointer-to-enum-cast
[X86] Don't add DELETED_NODES to DAG combine worklist after calling
[ThinLTO/LowerTypeTests] Handle unpromoted local type ids
Revert Restore [WPD/LowerTypeTests] Delay lowering/removal of type tests until after ICP
Revert Reland [DebugInfo] Enable the debug entry values feature by default
[JumpThreading] Skip unconditional PredBB when threading jumps through two basic blocks
Revert "[ARM] Improve codegen of volatile load/store of i64"
Revert "[InstCombine][DebugInfo] Fold constants wrapped in metadata"
Revert "[LICM] Support hosting of dynamic allocas out of loops"
Revert "[clang] detect switch fallthrough marked by a comment (PR43465)"
[CUDA] Warn about unsupported CUDA SDK version only if it's used.
[DAGCombiner] Do not fold truncate(build_vector(..)) if it creates an illegal type
PR45181: Fix another invalid DIExpression combination
